title: Cowpens National Battlefield: Education
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education             Education           A Cowpens Educational Experience Whether planning a field trip to Cowpens National Battlefield or learning about the park in the classroom, our educational pages will help you create a memorable experience for your students.  Find useful resources for planning a field trip. Download lesson plans to use both in the classroom and at the park. Prepare your students to be respectful stewards while visiting the park.   Â    Facilities Available Eastern National operates the bookstore. Teachers showing a valid Teacher ID may receive a 15% discount. SC Social Studies Standards Reinforced by a visit to Cowpens National Battlefield
